title: North Korean Hackers Exploit PowerShell Trick to Hijack Devices in New Cyberattack
description: The North Korea-linked threat actor known as Kimsuky has been observed using a new tactic that involves deceiving targets into running PowerShell as an administrator and then instructing them to paste and run malicious code provided by them.
